name: Burn Ban: Firestarter Edition
description:
(READ CONTENT WARNINGS BELOW BEFORE PLAYING) 

Burn Ban is an interactive visual novel with social media simulation mechanics accessed through the in-game character’s cell phone. You assume the role of Twig, a mentally ill queer girl who is sent to Camp Sisquoc, a summer retreat for misguided students. Just as Twig is getting used to camp life, her dead friend’s social media mysteriously starts posting again, and she and friends are set with determining the mystery behind the posts. 

The Burn Ban: Firestarter Edition is the definitive edition of Burn Ban for Windows and Mac, with all new art, up-scaled backgrounds, and more! The Firestarter Edition also comes with a comic which acts as a prequel to the events of the game! What you get:

Burn Ban: Firestarter Edition:

  • A Cool Visual Novel
  • It has Two Branching Paths
  • A Social Media System Free to explore!
  • ~2 Hours of Content
  • Higher Res Backgrounds
  • And a bonus comic in PDF form!
  • All for the price of $5.99 USD! 

The game will release on Halloween eve, October 30th.

Content Warnings: Mental Illness, Depression, Mention/Discussion of Suicide, Characters Coming to terms with a past of Sexual Assault/Rape and a past of survivors being ignored/shamed.
